title: Prepare for Final Walk-Through
description: The final walk-through is scheduled for tomorrow. The agent needs to prepare a checklist for their buyer client.

tasks.description: Identify the transaction and the scheduled walk-through time.
Retrieve the list of repairs the seller agreed to make from the transaction file.
Create a final walk-through checklist for the buyer, including verifying the agreed-upon repairs and checking that all systems are in working order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a comprehensive checklist and sends it to the buyer.
